$2100.name: INIDISP
$2100.description: Screen Display Register. Controls brightness and force blanking.

$2101.name: OBSEL
$2101.description: Object Size and Object Base. Controls sprite size and tile address.

$2121.name: CGADD
$2121.description: CGRAM Address. Sets the color index to write to.

$2122.name: CGDATA
$2122.description: CGRAM Data Write. Writes color data (Word access).

$4200.name: NMITIMEN
$4200.description: Interrupt Enable and Flags. Enables NMI, V-Count, H-Count interrupts.
